title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 427.3 - Facilities and equipment required for fire training programs
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 427.3 - Facilities and equipment required for fire training programs

State Regulations

Onsite review of facilities and equipment may be conducted by
the State Fire Administrator or his representative. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 19
ยง
427.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
